title: Sheldon Adelson
added: In the 2020 presidential campaign Adelson "gifted $75M into last-ditch effort to save Trump to SUPERPAC 'Preserve America'<ref>https://www.politico.com/news/2020/10/15/adelson-trump-super-pac-429688</ref>. Preserve America has been running "anti-Biden" ads blaming Biden for violence by 'liberal mobs' during actually mostful peaceful BLM protests.<ref>https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2020/10/16/this-summers-black-lives-matter-protesters-were-overwhelming-peaceful-our-research-finds/</ref> Biden was also blamed for the rising homicide number during the Trump's tenure as president. <ref>https://www.ispot.tv/ad/nmDX/preserve-america-pac-too-weak</ref>
